price: Ṣé ìró àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ ní ìṣáájú kò tí ì dé ba yín ni? Nítorí náà, wọ́n tọ́ ìyà ọ̀ràn wọn wò. Ìyà ẹlẹ́ta-eléro sì wà fún wọn.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ فَذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alam yatikum naba-u alladhīna kafarū min qablu fadhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
